channel.title: Comments on: Just eight days to go…

item.title: By: Robert Proctor
item.dc:creator: Robert Proctor
item.description: <p>Hi Matt,</p><p>Ever consider running this course as a series of Webinars</p><p>Let me know</p><p>From Canada</p><p>Robert Proctor</p>
item.content:encoded:
Hi Matt,

Ever consider running this course as a series of Webinars

Let me know

From Canada

Robert Proctor

item.title: By: Matt White
item.dc:creator: Matt White
item.description: <p>@Martin,</p><p>The plan is to run the course in the future yes, though there are no dates as yet. I am also in the process of making the course available as a series of online videos which you'll be able to subscribe to. Watch this space for more information!</p><p>Matt</p>
item.content:encoded:
@Martin,

The plan is to run the course in the future yes, though there are no dates as yet. I am also in the process of making the course available as a series of online videos which you’ll be able to subscribe to. Watch this space for more information!

Matt

item.title: By: Martin Perrie
item.dc:creator: Martin Perrie
item.description: <p>Are you planning on re-running the course at any point in the future, Matt?</p>
item.content:encoded: Are you planning on re-running the course at any point in the future, Matt?

item.title: By: Theo Heselmans
item.dc:creator: Theo Heselmans
item.description: <p>I'ld love to be there, just to see you in your element !<br/>I envy the people that will be there. They certainly will learn a lot !</p>
item.content:encoded:
I’ld love to be there, just to see you in your element !
I envy the people that will be there. They certainly will learn a lot !
